title: Distillery: No, you can’t make homemade hand sanitizer using vodka
content: Dermatology: Expert Connect Contact Us Contests Jobs Deals Coronavirus Distillery: No, you can’t make homemade hand sanitizer using vodka. A popular vodka manufacturer is encouraging people not to buy its product to combat the novel coronavirus. Tito's Vodka spent the day Thursday responding to people on Twitter who were saying they wanted to use Tito's to make hand sanitizer.
warning: Based on the content, title, language and advertisements on this page, it can be assumed that this page is credible!
